content: MOD HAT OFF http://www.military.com/news/article/recruiting-center-...186032310810&wh=news If Berkley doesn't make every effort to apprehend and prosecute the inbred slags responsible for this to the fullest extent of the law, every last penny of federal funding needs to be withheld from that cesspool. As to the scumbags themselves, I'd pay to see them executed and strung up by their heels in the town square, ala Il Duce. This message has been edited.
